channel.title: How do u make mod or admins on ur servers?
channel.description: if anyone can please tell me id be great full and if possible how u can get npcs to say *MY NAME* is currently online/offline thanks!!

item.title: How do u make mod or admins on ur servers?
item.dc:creator: @123abcpker 123abcpker
item.description:
@123abcpker wrote:

Thats easy, Go into your source, go into your Charcter Files Put Player Rights as 1 for Mod 2 for Admin

item.title: How do u make mod or admins on ur servers?
item.dc:creator: @mr_dharok mr dharok
item.description:
@mr_dharok wrote:

for the mod/admin go into your source and choose characters,then open up the character file of whoever u want to be ur mod/admin then go to player rights(about 10 lines down) 0 is normal player btw, change the 0 to 1 for mod,0 to 2 for admin and the 0-3 for owner(yourself)

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make mod or admins on ur servers?
